name: Grand Creation
description:
Grand Creation is a intriguing game where you build, play, and design breathtaking levels! Now on mobile, this game allows you to navigate INFINITE projects, save and edit your projects from a dos-like command prompt, play through multiple stages, change the background and music, and more! Play it for free today! Don't forget to leave a review! Any feedback would be very appreciated!

CONTROLS

While Running a Level

TAP/CLICK to jump

HOLD/DRAG to run

While Editing a Level

DRAG to place/destroy

CLICK buttons to navigate and change options

While In CMD

TYPE  LOAD to load a level. Make sure to create a level first using MAKE!

TYPE MAKE to create a level.

TYPE PLAY to play a level. You can choose 1, 2, 3, or 4.

TYPE ASSIGN to modify the level's values. Argument One specifies the level to modify. Argument Two is a number of your choice from 1-3. This number will be the result of the change. Argument Three is the setting you want to change. Note that you cannot change some values when using a template.

TYPE QUICK to speed up the commands. If you don't like the old-computer like delays, you can speed it up.

TYPE RELOAD to load your last edited level.

TYPE EXIT to close the game!

NOTE THAT THE GOAL OF YOUR COURSES ARE NOT TO GET TO THE END, BUT TO DESTROY ALL THE ROCKS!

Enjoy the game!
